description:
Built for severe weather conditions in unforgiving environments, the Alpha SV Bib delivers serious alpine performance. Constructed from N100D 3L GORE-TEX PRO with Most Rugged Technology, the Alpha SV Bib offers waterproof, breathable protection and outstanding durability. Featured for confidence in extreme conditions, the bib includes an embedded RECCO® reflector to aid search and rescue, and the streamlined, articulated fit moves with you as you climb.

Redesigned with a revised fit and N100D GORE-TEX PRO material for improved durability and comfort.
name: Arcteryx Alpha SV Bib, Reg - Mens
